target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and content creators looking to build online audiences and products
pain_points: not knowing what to get loud about on the internet
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions hundreds of thousands of communities on Reddit as opportunity indicator

problems_validated.problem: 95% of communities are zombies due to poor engagement and retention
problems_validated.severity: high - affects majority of community builders
problems_validated.market_gap: lack of proper engagement and retention mechanisms

problems_validated.problem: People don't know what niche to focus on for content creation
problems_validated.market_gap: lack of systematic approach to find underserved niches

products_tools.name: School
products_tools.use_case: building engaged online communities with gamification and retention features

products_tools.name: boring marketing.com
products_tools.use_case: AI tools to help companies with SEO

products_tools.name: Reddit
products_tools.use_case: finding underserved niches and community opportunities

business_strategies.strategy: Replace the word 'product' with 'solution' - focus on solving problems and making people's lives easier
business_strategies.implementation: Think about being a good host, make things simpler for users
business_strategies.expected_results: products that people remember and come top of mind

business_strategies.strategy: Short form video as the new blogs, transition to newsletters, subscriptions, links
business_strategies.implementation: Start with short video content, then funnel to other formats

problems_solutions.problem: Not knowing what to get loud about on the internet for audience building
problems_solutions.solution: Use Reddit to find underserved niches, or document your personal learning journey publicly
steps: Research Reddit communities and growth rates

problems_solutions.problem: Phone addiction reducing productivity and presence
problems_solutions.solution: Education, apps designed to limit phone use, cultural shift toward phone use being low status
steps: Acknowledge apps are designed to be addictive
Download apps that limit phone use
Embrace cultural shift away from constant phone use

startup_ideas.idea: Apps and Chrome extensions designed to reduce phone usage
startup_ideas.problem_solved: excessive phone use and lack of presence
startup_ideas.validation: cultural zeitgeist moving toward phone use being low status

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Giving up on SEO because of AI/LLMs
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: missing out on traffic and audience building opportunities
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand that SEO will evolve, not die - Google prioritizing UGC content
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People said SEO would die when YouTube and Facebook emerged, but it adapted

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Starting content creation on platforms you don't enjoy using
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Won't consistently show up and do the necessary 10,000 hours
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Choose platforms where your audience lives AND where you'll consistently create
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Creator finds video difficult but writing simple, so focuses on writing platforms

growth_tactics.tactic: Document personal learning journeys publicly to attract niche communities
steps: Live stream or document the learning process

growth_tactics.tactic: Use School platform for community building with gamification
steps: Set up different levels in community
Create posts that can be emailed to members
growth_tactics.results_expected: higher retention and engagement than 95% of communities

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: use platforms like School with built-in engagement features

trends_signals.trend: Phone use becoming low status, especially in public
trends_signals.opportunity: apps and services that help reduce phone usage

trends_signals.trend: Google prioritizing UGC (user-generated content) over AI content
trends_signals.opportunity: human-created blogs with unique points of view will be prioritized

trends_signals.trend: Short form video becoming the new blogs
trends_signals.opportunity: transition from short video to newsletters, subscriptions, blogs

actionable_quotes.quote: just replace the word product with Solution that's really what it is
actionable_quotes.actionability: reframe product thinking to focus on problem-solving

actionable_quotes.context: choosing social media platforms for content creation
actionable_quotes.actionability: prioritize platforms where you can consistently show up over trendy platforms

actionable_quotes.quote: the simplest products win and the products that really make people's lives easier are the ones that people remember
actionable_quotes.actionability: focus on simplicity and ease of use in product development

key_statistics.context: discussing why most online communities fail due to poor engagement and retention

key_statistics.statistic: 8 months a year in Miami, 3 months in Quebec
key_statistics.context: creator's location split for lifestyle design

comment_insights.insight: Quebec audience engagement suggests regional/cultural connection resonates
comment_insights.author: @francoislanthiernadeau
comment_insights.relevance: Shows audience connection to creator's Quebec roots mentioned in video

top_validated_comments.author: @francoislanthiernadeau
top_validated_comments.business_value: Validates audience connection to creator's Quebec background and lifestyle choices

comment_derived_trends.trend: Limited comment engagement suggests either small audience or low engagement video
supporting_comments: Only one comment with minimal engagement
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: May indicate need for better audience engagement strategies or content optimization

meta.title: My Community Asked THIS, And My Answer Was…
